name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to the large number of submissions for the early start of school during the winter vacation, we announced the launch of
"611Study.ICU, a reporting box for overtime study in primary, middle and high schools across the country"
Used to expose the illegal opening of schools across the country and the excessive and high-pressure learning practices.


In China, more and more schools are implementing the so-called "611 school system" - classes start at 6 a.m. and end at 11 p.m. This almost endless study pressure pushes students into an abyss where they cannot breathe. The heavy schoolbag not only bends the spine, but also the youth that should be brilliant and the soul that should be breathing freely.

Knowledge should light up life, not extinguish hope.
Education should cultivate thinking, not weaken will.
The true meaning of education should not be competition above all else, and it should not be at the expense of children's physical and mental health.

This form is based on Google Form and is filled out anonymously. No login is required and no personal information will be recorded. But please be careful to protect your privacy...
fullContent:
由于寒假提前开学的投稿太多，我们宣布发起
“ 611Study .ICU，全国小初高中超时学习举报箱”
用以揭露全国各地学校违规开学超时高压学习的行为。


在中国，越来越多的学校实施所谓的「611学制」——早上6点上课，晚上11点放学。 这种近乎无休止的学习压力，将学生推入无法喘息的深渊。沉重的书包压弯的不只是嵴樑，还有本应灿烂的青春和自由呼吸的灵魂。

知识本应点亮人生，而不是熄灭希望。
教育本应培养思考，而不是消磨意志。
教育的真谛不该是竞争至上，更不该以牺牲孩子的身心健康为代价。

此表单基于 Google Form 匿名填写，无需登录，且不会记录任何个人信息。 但仍请谨慎保护自己的隐私。

让我们一起，为被压迫在「611」制度下的学生发声。

所有数据我们将在2月2日开始陆续公布。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
White House press secretary Levitt said on Friday that US President Trump will impose a 25% tariff on Canada and Mexico and a 10% tariff on China starting Saturday. Levitt said a written plan will be released to the public on Saturday.
The Chinese Embassy in the United States said that China "firmly opposes" Trump's new tariffs, "there will be no winners in a trade war or tariff war, and it is not in the interests of any party or even the whole world." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1885740956743569408/pu/img/mcmzRroMUNfkQsG4.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Facing Trump’s tariff threat, some “positive energy” bloggers disagree:… https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiuCx8JbcAAEgvd.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Canadian caretaker Prime Minister Trudeau said he is ready to take action against the United States if Trump insists on imposing tariffs on Canada. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1885746381270528000/pu/img/d9FydAaFy5wboRgv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
We have received some student submissions.
We hope more people can pay attention to their plight.

Wenxian No. 1 Middle School in Jiaozuo, Henan, Fenyang Middle School in Luliang, Shanxi, Qinghua Middle School in Suqian, Jiangsu, and some high schools in Datong, Shanxi

Usually, they only have a break once a week or even two weeks. They start running exercises at 6:18 in the morning and finish school at 10:40 at the latest. Now the winter vacation is only 6 days, and school will start on the evening of the fifth day of the New Year.

Students are under great pressure and have no way to complain. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiuXb_YXYAAroQu.jpg

content:
"By the time politicians shake hands and make peace, we will have already integrated into the land"
At the beginning of the new year 2025, the last search record on the phone of a Ukrainian soldier who died in Kursk. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiujDuXbAAAFx8N.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump on Saturday made good on his threat to impose high tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China, setting the stage for a trade war with the United States' largest trading partners. The tariffs are scheduled to take effect on Tuesday.
The United States said the measures will last until the national emergency caused by fentanyl drugs and illegal immigration in the United States ends.
Chinese Foreign Ministry: China has stated its position many times and has always believed that there are no winners in trade wars and tariff wars. China has always firmly safeguarded its national interests.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xinhua News Agency: The White House released a fact list and announced that it would impose a 10% tariff on Chinese products exported to the United States on the grounds of fentanyl and other issues. China is strongly dissatisfied with this and firmly opposes it.
China will file a lawsuit with the WTO and will take corresponding countermeasures to firmly safeguard its own rights and interests. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GixSEOrbIAAN_bV.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that someone went to Liaoning to visit Li Wenliang's parents. Li Wenliang's mother said: We are very difficult and sad. The two old people spend every day in tears. When Li Wenliang died, we were not allowed to see him, not even through the window, and not even in the funeral home. His mother complained: "This is too inhumane. What kind of leader is this?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1885975177181462528/pu/img/x7Alj4DvQQEcOWqY.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many people in Jingzhou, Hubei, complained on social media that the tap water quality was poor and that they smelled a strange smell after boiling it. Someone uploaded the incident to the Internet and then received a call asking them to delete the video. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gixbc6WbsAACxME.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: White House Press Secretary Levitt said at a briefing on Friday that COVID-19 originated from a laboratory in Wuhan, China, which is a "verifiable fact". Earlier, Trump's CIA Director Ratcliffe had said that he would prioritize clarifying the origin of COVID-19 after taking office. He said a few days ago: "This is what I will do on my first day. I think our intelligence, science and common sense all show that COVID originated from a leak in the Wuhan Institute of Virology." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1885986848889303040/pu/img/61MFmIoGPev0g0ca.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 25, a lawyer from Jiangsu Province disclosed a case in Wulidun Village, Guangshan County, Henan Province. A villager publicly called the village director "scumbag" at a village meeting. Afterwards, the village director called the police and the villager was detained for 10 days by the Guangshan County police. The villagers and the county government believed that they should not be detained and fined, while the village cadres and the county police believed that they should be detained and fined. Henan High Court: The villagers calling the village director "scumbag" is an insult stipulated by law. Therefore, the court ruled to reject the appeal of the villagers and the county government https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gixj7SDbIAEE4kT.jpg

"Hongqi Auto Parts City" "Is it 100% reimbursed?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1885998554457821184/pu/img/sqhmcFRo9tAcLgdd.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
North Korean families buy fake TB certificates to avoid sending their children to Russia.
As more families try to prevent their children from being sent to Russia, the price of bribing hospital officials to issue fake TB certificates has risen to $500 from $100 last year, making it unaffordable for residents, said a resident of the North's Ryanggang Province who did not want to be named.
A resident of North Pyongan Province in northwestern North Korea said: People are looking for ways to raise money to buy medical exemption certificates, including selling properties and borrowing money. But the North Pyongan government appears to be fighting back against fake certificates by forcing citizens who meet military qualifications to undergo TB tests every three months, instead of once a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 1 (Released) The video shows several workers holding a water pipe to water the green plants, and a woman in white clothes taking pictures nearby. The person who filmed it said, "They pretended to work, one person took pictures, and then they dispersed on the spot after taking the pictures." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886007912176529408/pu/img/sp2AzYyfa-OLgrSe.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 2, Zhuzhou, Hunan. A man fell unconscious on the roadside while riding a bicycle. During this time, vehicles kept passing by but did not stop. The residents around just took a look and went back to the house without going forward to check.
An insider said: "The man was able to move, but was taken away by 120" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886010367115223040/pu/img/iozihGAXedRn_VTb.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 2, a Henan Village Bank depositor received a call from the police. The police asked him whether he had posted in the group that he wanted to go to Henan and die with the police; and whether he was going to visit other places recently. The depositor said: Our country's laws stipulate freedom of speech. Since you can't guarantee the safety of our property, it is normal for us to die with you. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886015047501328384/pu/img/I1fPZ7lcib9u8XH3.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many parents have reported in the comments section of Xiaohongshu that they beat their children and injured them because they did not listen to them.
Parents said: "Today, I helped my daughter with her homework and broke her scalp" "I broke my son's head again today" "I usually kick him" "I slapped my 8-year-old for wetting the bed for two days in a row. If I don't beat him, I will be sick" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gix9kdUbkAAgFXC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Global Times: The governor of Texas, the United States, signed an executive order on Friday, announcing that DeepSeek and Xiaohongshu would be banned from electronic devices owned by the local government. Previously, a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said at a press conference on January 14: China will continue to work with all parties to adhere to openness without building walls, interconnection without disconnection, equality without discrimination, and create an open, inclusive, inclusive and non-discriminatory artificial intelligence environment. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiyA9bXaUAAoHQR.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the face of Trump's tariff increase, some "positive energy" bloggers disagree:
Gu Yan Mu Chan: The effect of raising tariffs on Chinese goods entering the US market during Trump 1.0 was not good. In Trump's second term, if he raises tariffs on Chinese goods again, the effect will be even worse.
Chen Ping: The Canadian Prime Minister raised tariffs to fight Trump, and China should follow suit. US inflation will rise immediately and the stock market bubble will burst.
Shu Jianwu: The United States wants to maintain its hegemonic image, but it doesn't have many cards to play. "Raising tariffs will affect inflation. It can only increase 10% for China and 25% for other countries."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 1 (posted), a Chinese student showed off on Xiaohongshu that he used Japanese medical insurance to reimburse high expenses: "I earned 13 million Baga coins in one year of studying abroad" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiyJRmNbYAA5b_Q.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 1, a blogger wrote an article explaining why the country is unwilling to significantly increase farmers' pensions: Farmers are not citizens, but essentially tenants of the country because they do not own the land and their property may be taken away at any time. If the country gives farmers pensions, farmers will lose their "tenant" status, lose their value of extraction, and shake the foundation of the country.
The article has been deleted. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiyOPgVaQAAuclX.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 1 (released), a contract soldier from Hebei Province still could not get a house after his family was demolished for ten years. The government said: "Don't worry, you are a farmer. People with connections are waiting." Calling 12345 was useless. In addition, the salary in the county town was low, so he chose to go to Russia to join the army. He said, "I am very grateful to the Hebei government for letting me take this path. Thank you for your eight generations of ancestors." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886043618995253248/pu/img/LVLvrNZ7aawfHeRV.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 1, Foshan, Guangdong. Local residents said that everyone in the village was playing mahjong during the Chinese New Year, and a group of police officers with shields came. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886049473387962369/pu/img/O6q2eyl7FDVDQj5y.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man who sells used cars said, "I'm not talking nonsense when I say that some domestic cars are not worth buying." The airbag of this "Mou Di" accident car did not even pop out. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886055155717812224/pu/img/tn-X4nhWIoCftZPL.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the R1 model of Deepseek, a Chinese AI company, has attracted widespread attention from all over the world as soon as it was released.
This incident caused a great shock and seemed to symbolize that China is breaking through the technological blockade from the United States in the past few years. But at the same time, illegal distillation, speech censorship, and controversies against Deepseek are increasing.
How did Deepseek do all this? Will the artificial intelligence AI market be reshuffled? What does ideological censorship mean for the future development of artificial intelligence? Today, we invited a PhD student in North America, who has visited and interned at many top universities, and was a manager of a top model company in China before going abroad. The technical expert @xROx8964 of the $LI community, to talk about his views and his insights into the industry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A supermarket owner in Guangzhou wrote an article about his rough experience after his supermarket was robbed and reported the case. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiyiXR_aEAA2GZJ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Thailand plans to cut off power supply to Myawaddy and other areas on the Myanmar border.
On January 31, Thai Deputy Prime Minister Anutin asked the National Security Council to investigate the security situation in areas supplying electricity to Myanmar. The results of the investigation will clearly indicate which areas are involved in illegal activities such as fraud and pose a threat to Thailand's national security. The results of the investigation will also serve as a basis for subsequent decisions on whether to interrupt power supply. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Giymh7zaUAIlALj.jpg

January 29. Shanghai. A supermarket owner said that his products were only placed on the steps and did not occupy the road. As a result, he was taken to the store by the urban management staff. He said that it was different from what he saw online. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886069970695827456/pu/img/Uz9ltIQTZ90fY7vK.jpg

Let's start with us and give Chinese teenagers a complete childhood.
